name: GetPlayerCustomSkin
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3.DL R1 and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Returns the class of the players custom skin downloaded from the server.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The player you want to get the skin from

return_values: The custom skin id that was specified in AddCharModel newid
related_fn:
GetPlayerSkin: Get a player's current skin.
 SetPlayerSkin: Set a player's skin.
